testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: Guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user choose gender type................................................passed And User enters first name "automation" and last name "tester"..............passed And User enters date of birth...............................................passed And User Enter email "test7@example.com"....................................passed And user fills password field "P@assword" and confirm the password..........passed And User clicks on register button..........................................passed Then Success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | Users could use login functionality to use their account
testcase.name: User login with valid username and Password
testcase.system-out: Given User is in login page.................................................passed And User enters valid email "test6@example.com" and valid password "P@assword".passed And User clicks on login button.............................................passed Then User logs in...........................................................passed
